definition: without learning or skills (idiom); ignorant and incompetent
various genera of flowers of Asteracea family (daisies and chrysanthemums), including Atractylis lancea

sentences.english: There is no ignorance, there is knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 不会不学无术，我们追求知识。

sentences.english: Art has an enemy called ignorance.
sentences.chinese: 艺术的敌人就是不学无术。

sentences.english: Yeah, and they are all laced with melamine, you ignoramus.
sentences.chinese: 是啊，他们都含有三聚氰胺，不学无术。

sentences.english: Study hard, or you'll be an uneducated man.
sentences.chinese: 努力学习，否则你会是个不学无术的人。

definition: not to engage in honest work/to ignore one's proper occupation/not to attend to one's proper duties
wine sack, food bag (idiom); useless person, only fit for guzzling and boozing
to think too much of oneself/self-important/arrogant
to go dining, wining, whoring and gambling/to lead a life of dissipation
to think of oneself as high and pure (idiom); smug and self-righteous/holier-than-thou
happy to partake but not prepared to do any work (idiom)/all take and no give
to take advantage of one's position to bully people (idiom)/to kick people around
